name: Get a single template
description:
The API also allows fetching the source of a single template.

Use the raw [media type](/enterprise/2.12/v3/media/) to get the raw contents.

body.name: C
body.source:
# Object files
*.o

# Libraries
*.lib
*.a

# Shared objects (inc. Windows DLLs)
*.dll
*.so
*.so.*
*.dylib

# Executables
*.exe
*.out
*.app

responses.description: Use the raw [media type](/enterprise/2.12/v3/media/) to get the raw contents.
